Intro.Text: Just twentyfour hours we have sailing in our epochal plasma sailing carrier. And twentyfour hors have passed since I messed wit hthe boss and here I am sitting a shitty cell on this ship.

Honestly, I`m not even suprised. I stuff a few bites of the delicious deephexagon-carp into myself. Maybe I`ll burn the boss to the flagpole the next chance i get, I`m not going to take that, IÂ´m supposed to give up half the treasure just so he doesn`t report us to galactic customs.

Hints.Text: Don`t exept the way one side.....
There is not only one direction.
Use your enviroment as a tool.
Bad habits should always be kept in mind.

Gameplay.Text: As I stared into the room, I saw somethings strange, was it a mirage, where are Hannes and Gregori, my trained academy pilots?
There`s really no one here from the whole crew, there were nine of us, where are Zivik, Sportan and Hendrik, those assholes are always sitting here around.

At least the boss his golden boy will witness my big return, he`ll probably scold me like a little kid again. Malik is just too green behind the ears, he`s just not ready for this difficult adventure, I don`t even know if I`m ready, am I?
My body stiffens, there are at least two objects that are sudenly somewhere else, I haven`t heard anything and haven`t seen anyone, what`s going on here ?
I peer straight into the room and can`t believe my eyes.
I am almost scared to death. I heard absolutely nothing.
The Access to the rescue plasma boats is closed.
Silence. So much silence, just the distant hiss of air escaping into space.
How long have I been travelling? Two, three hours, two minutes? two seconds?
No one there, I`m screwed.
I wince as fear stabs into my heart. Well, not exactly.....
Should i admit to myself that i can`t fly a real ship, but you could try.
Shit, the controlpanel came off, who the hel did that. Well, unfortunately I don`t have a flying licence, but I`ll get one, when i reached the academy.
I hate this silence.
Wait a minute! Maybe this is just a dream and i have to wake up, i will beat myself. No, that didn`t helped, maybe i have to die to wake up?
Are all the crew lost? neutralised?
My hands and feet are reacting even before my brain has properly gasped the words, it``s all to much for me.
I am 384.000 kilometres from Ellis Station. My heartbeat is deafening, I can`t screw this up.
Dam Pigs! They`ll just leave here and possibly go to Treasure Island.
My heart slips into my pants, I swallow harder, I try to calm down. But this room is frightening.
Silence descends upon me..........
My first reaction to stress has always been spend moeny for the Casino Spaceship G Simulator.
A sharp pain chases through my head as I try to speak, so sharp I can even feel it in my teeth. I hold onto the wall until the pain subsides, hoping it won`t come back.
